com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.objects.block

Class Sign

  • com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.objects.block.Block
    • com.chattriggers.ctjs.minecraft.wrappers.objects.block.Sign

  • public class Sign
extends Block

    Creates a new Sign object wrapper. Returned with {@link Player#lookingAt()} when looking at a sign. Extends {@link Block}.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sign

        public Sign(@NotNull
            Block block)

        Creates a new Sign object wrapper. Returned with {@link Player#lookingAt()} when looking at a sign. Extends {@link Block}.

        Parameters:
        block - the {@link Block} to convert to a Sign
